page.title: 04ETHNIC CONSIDERATIONS CONT.
page.content: SHOPS ETC. THERE IS SOME FEELING THAT THE VARIOUS{STATUTORY SERVICES}OFTEN DO NOT CATER FOR THE NEEDS OF THE {ASIAN}PEOPLE.THERE HAVE BEEN SOME CHANGES IN,FOR INSTANCE,THE{EDUCATION {DEPARTMENT}FACILITIES.{HALAL MEAT}IS SERVED AT MISSION GROVE SCHOOL,AS AN EXAMPLE.THERE IS A LOT OF SCOPE FOR HEALTH VISITORS TO BE INVOLVED IN {HEALTH CARE CAMPAIGNS}AS THERE IS A DEGREE OF IGNORANCE ABOUT DIETARY NEEDS ETC.THERE ARE FEW CULTURAL FACILITIES AND ACTIVITIES IN THE AREA.THERE ARE NO{MOSQUES}BUT THERE IS ONE IN QUEENS ROAD AND ONE IN LEA BRIDGE ROAD. WE HAVE ENCOUNTERED THE FOLLOWING {SPECIFIC FACILITIES FOR ASIAN PEOPLE IN THIS NEIGHBOURHOOD:- {ASIAN FAMILY GROUP:}THIS GROUP OF 8-20 WOMEN MEET AT TRURO ROAD COMMUNITY CENTRE EACH THURSDAY AFTERNOON BETWEEN
